title: PlotMe地皮插件，普通玩家没权限领取地皮！！高悬赏不给是孙子
author: wp646010489

replies.author: a799760183
replies.txt_content:
wp646010489 发表于 2014-8-9 15:57
咋给
/mangaddp builder plotme.use
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.x          这里的X是玩家地皮数量限制  
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.add
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.remove
  上面权限添加完基本就行了

replies.author: _CrazyNut_
replies.txt_content:
玩家权限：
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove

/manuaddp 用户 权限     给用户权限

replies.author: wp646010489
replies.txt_content:
a799760183 发表于 2014-8-9 16:03
/mangaddp builder plotme.use
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.x          这里的X是玩家地皮数量限制   ...
全？

replies.author: 怒风丶
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder plotme.use
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.1         这里的X是玩家地皮数量限制   我已经帮你设置1最多领取1块地皮了
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.add
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.remove
  上面权限添加完基本就行了    你只要在游戏里面输入就可以了
     

{:10_512:}
